name: Pumpkin
greetingText: As a token of my undying love for you!
textInChatBox: Happy Valentine!! Yeee! Many many happy valentines...
text2: I was going to write you a love letter.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special, and I love you to the moon and back
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
